categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Zai-Uram was a male Mirialan Jedi Master who served the Republic during the Third Galactic War.

Zai-Uram was part of the Republic garrison on Dantooine during the Third Galactic War. When Dantooine was invaded by the reconstituted Sith Empire and the Nova Blades, he and Major Vindo took command of the defense.
